item.title: Adam add a quote by Adam McOmber
item.description: "Just before he passed behind the hedge at the end of the drive, he turned to look back at Stoke Morrow and caught me spying on him. His shining eyes were so cruel, and before I could close the curtain, I saw the flash of an awful grin on his face. It was a grin that said he knew I'd come around. Sooner or later, I'd fall in line." -- Adam McOmber

item.title: Adam add a quote by Adam McOmber
item.description: "I had no lock that could be picked. If anything, I was the landscape behind the door, and even on that day in the ruin, I was still only beginning to comprehend my own flora and fauna." -- Adam McOmber
